adDetails: Seasoned digital designer, illustrator and creative director committed to exceeding each and every clients expectations. For the past twenty plus years I've been creating high end graphics and effects for national tv commercials. Now out of the rat race, I specialize in logo and identity design, digital illustration, graphic design, photo manipulation, color correction and retouching. As well as, product, interior and character design. I know the questions to ask in order to deliver a quality product that's on time and on budget. I'm passionate about the creative process so there's no project to big or to small. Other services include art & creative direction for the film, advertising and interior design industries. I'm also available to consult with start ups and small business to identify, develop and implement a cohesive business or brand identity. Please visit my website to see all of my work http://www.coroflot.com/stuff Thanks for your consideration Scott Williams
